amendment.description: To clarify that a volunteer for a federally-created citizen volunteer program and for the program's State and local affiliates is protected by the Volunteer Protection Act.

action.text: Amendment SA 3930 ruled non-germane by the chair.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 3930.

Amendment SA 3930 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator McConnell. (consideration: CR S10253; text: CR S10253) To clarify that a volunteer for a federally-created citizen volunteer program and for the program's State and local affiliates is protected by the Volunteer Protection Act.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3930 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator McConnell.
